verbs.description: It [V: seemed] [ARG1: a couple of months ago , when Rudy Giuliani joined the legal team of popular vote loser Donald Trump , that he was merely the comic relief in this never]
It seemed a couple of months ago , when [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] [V: joined] [ARG1: the legal team of popular vote loser Donald Trump] , that he was merely the comic relief in this never
It seemed a couple of months ago , when Rudy Giuliani joined the legal team of popular vote loser Donald Trump , that [ARG1: he] [V: was] [ARGM-ADV: merely] [ARG2: the comic relief in this never]
